price: (32) And We made the sky a protected ceiling, but they, from its signs,[884] are turning away.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقۡفٗا مَّحۡفُوظٗاۖ وَهُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِهَا مُعۡرِضُونَ
footnotes: [884]- The signs present in the heavens.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā al-samāa saqfan maḥfūẓan wahum ʿan āyātihā muʿ'riḍūna
